## goal logging enable

Enable Algorand remote logging

### Synopsis

Enable Algorand remote logging with specified node name

```
goal logging enable -n nodeName [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help          help for enable
  -n, --name string   Friendly-name to use for node
```
